English text: Submit return[ Submit month year Return]
Welsh text: Cyflwyno Datganiad[ Cyflwyno Datganiad month year]
Cwblhau Datganiad[ ar gyfer month year]

English text: View return[ View month year Return]
Welsh text: Gweld Datganiad[ Gweld Datganiad month year]
Gweld Datganiad[ ar gyfer month year]
Datganiad Toll Alcohol ar gyfer [Month Year]

English text: Submitted on [Day Month Year] at [hours:minutes am/pm]
Welsh text: Cyflwynwyd ar [Day Month Year] am [hours:minutes am/pm]
Cyfanswm gwerth y doll a ddatganwyd

English text: Spirits production in the last 3 months
Welsh text: Gwirodydd a gynhyrchwyd yn ystod y 3 mis diwethaf

English text: Payments take up to 7 working days to show, depending on how you pay. After you complete your return your tax calculation will take up to 2 days.
Welsh text: Bydd yn cymryd hyd at 7 diwrnod gwaith i daliadau ymddangos, yn dibynnu ar sut rydych yn talu. Ar ôl i chi gwblhau’ch Datganiad, bydd eich cyfrifiad treth yn cymryd hyd at 2 ddiwrnod.
Taliad ar gyfer Datganiad Toll Alcohol (cyf: )
Credyd ar gyfer Datganiad Toll Alcohol (cyf: )

Comments: We've interpreted this as "interest charge on a refund payment" but please let us know if the meaning should be "refund of an interest charge" and we'll update the translation.

English text: An unallocated payment is when you have overpaid or made a payment without a reference so it hasn’t been allocated to a specific return. Unallocated payments will be used to pay any due or overdue payments.
Welsh text: Os byddwch yn gordalu neu’n gwneud taliad heb gyfeirnod, ni ellir dyrannu’r taliad i Ddatganiad penodol. Yr enw ar hyn yw ‘Taliad heb ei ddyrannu’, felly. Bydd taliadau heb eu dyrannu yn cael eu defnyddio i dalu unrhyw daliadau sy’n ddyledus neu’n hwyr.

English text: Cleared late payment interest charge payments (ref: )
Welsh text: Taliadau llog am dalu’n hwyr sydd wedi’u clirio (cyf: )
Taliadau Toll Alcohol sydd wedi’u clirio

English text: Cleared payments are those where monies have been received by HMRC or an existing credit balance has been used to pay any applicable duty.
Welsh text: Mae ‘Taliadau wedi’u clirio’ yn golygu achosion pan fo arian wedi dod i law CThEF, neu pan fo balans credyd presennol wedi’i ddefnyddio i dalu unrhyw doll berthnasol.
